alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Somerset; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 6:42AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northern Kennebec... central Oxford...northwestern Waldo...north central Androscoggin... southeastern Somerset and southeastern Franklin Counties... At 641 AM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 7 miles west of Madison to 8 miles east of Berlin... and moving east AT 35 MPH. Locations impacted include... Waterville, Farmington, Fairfield, Bethel, Oakland, Rumford, Skowhegan, Pittsfield, Thorndike, Turner, Madison, Jay, Clinton, Belgrade, Livermore Falls, Dixfield, Canton, Andover, Norridgewock, and Wilton. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 124 and 154. This also includes... Mount Blue, Mount Zircon, and Baldpate Mountain. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. If traveling pull off to a safe location.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Somerset; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
